tool.name: InspectAdapter
tool.command:
InspectAdapter
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_inspect_in: -inspect_in #end if #if $param_inspect_out: -inspect_out #end if #if $param_inspect_directory: -inspect_directory "$param_inspect_directory" #end if #if $param_temp_data_directory: -temp_data_directory "$param_temp_data_directory" #end if #if $param_dbs: -dbs "$param_dbs" #end if #if $param_trie_dbs: -trie_dbs "$param_trie_dbs" #end if #if $param_new_db: -new_db "$param_new_db" #end if #if $param_instrument: -instrument #if " " in str($param_instrument): "$param_instrument" #else $param_instrument #end if #end if #if $param_precursor_mass_tolerance: -precursor_mass_tolerance $param_precursor_mass_tolerance #end if #if $param_peak_mass_tolerance: -peak_mass_tolerance $param_peak_mass_tolerance #end if #if $param_list_modifications: -list_modifications #end if #if $param_modifications: -modifications "$param_modifications" #end if #if $param_use_monoisotopic_mod_mass: -use_monoisotopic_mod_mass #end if #if $param_modifications_xml_file: -modifications_xml_file "$param_modifications_xml_file" #end if #if $param_cleavage: -cleavage "$param_cleavage" #end if #if $param_inspect_output: -inspect_output $param_inspect_output #end if #if $param_inspect_input: -inspect_input $param_inspect_input #end if #if $param_multicharge: -multicharge #end if #if $param_max_modifications_pp: -max_modifications_pp $param_max_modifications_pp #end if #if $param_tag_count: -tag_count $param_tag_count #end if #if $param_no_tmp_dbs: -no_tmp_dbs #end if #if $param_p_value: -p_value $param_p_value #end if #if $param_contact_name: -contact_name "$param_contact_name" #end if #if $param_contact_institution: -contact_institution "$param_contact_institution" #end if #if $param_contact_info: -contact_info "$param_contact_info" #end if #if $param_blind_blind: -blind:blind #end if #if $param_blind_blind_only: -blind:blind_only #end if #if $param_blind_p_value_blind: -blind:p_value_blind $param_blind_p_value_blind #end if #if $param_blind_snd_db: -blind:snd_db "$param_blind_snd_db" #end if #if $param_blind_max_ptm_size: -blind:max_ptm_size $param_blind_max_ptm_size #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: input file in mzXML or mzData format
param.help:
(-in)
Note: In mode 'inspect_out' an Inspect results file is read

param.name: param_inspect_in
param.label:
if this flag is set the InspectAdapter will read in mzXML,
write an Inspect input file and generate a trie database

param.name: param_inspect_out
param.label:
if this flag is set the InspectAdapter will read in a Inspect results file
and write idXML

param.name: param_inspect_directory
param.label: the directory in which Inspect is located

param.name: param_temp_data_directory
param.label: a directory in which some temporary files can be stored

param.name: param_dbs
param.label: name(s) of database(s) to search in (FASTA and SwissProt supported)

param.name: param_trie_dbs
param.label: name(s) of databases(s) to search in (trie-format)

param.name: param_new_db
param.label: name of the merged trie database

param.name: param_instrument
param.label:
the instrument that was used to measure the spectra
(If set to QTOF, uses a QTOF-derived fragmentation model,
and does not attempt to correct the parent mass.)

param.name: param_precursor_mass_tolerance
param.label: the precursor mass tolerance

param.name: param_peak_mass_tolerance
param.label: the peak mass tolerance

param.name: param_list_modifications
param.label: show a list of the available modifications

param.name: param_modifications
param.label:
the colon-separated modifications; may be
,,
param.help:
(-modifications) e.g.: Deamidation,opt or
,,,, e.g.: H2C2O,KCS,opt,Acetyl or
,,,, e.g.: 42.0367,KCS,opt,Acetyl or
Valid values for type are "fix" and "opt" (default)
If you want terminal PTMs, write "cterm" or "nterm" instead of residues

param.name: param_use_monoisotopic_mod_mass
param.label: use monoisotopic masses for the modifications

param.name: param_modifications_xml_file
param.label: name of an XML file with the modifications

param.name: param_cleavage
param.label: the enzyme used for digestion

param.name: param_inspect_input
param.label: name for the input file of Inspect (may only be used in a full run)

param.name: param_multicharge
param.label:
attempt to guess the precursor charge and mass,
and consider multiple charge states if feasible

param.name: param_max_modifications_pp
param.label: number of PTMs permitted in a single peptide

param.name: param_tag_count
param.label: number of tags to generate

param.name: param_no_tmp_dbs
param.label: no temporary databases are used

param.name: param_p_value
param.label: annotations with inferior p-value are ignored

param.name: param_contact_name
param.label: Name of the contact

param.name: param_contact_institution
param.label: Name of the contact institution

param.name: param_contact_info
param.label: Some information about the contact

param.name: param_blind_blind
param.label:
perform a blind search (allowing arbitrary modification masses),
is preceeded by a normal search to gain a smaller database

param.name: param_blind_blind_only
param.label: like blind but no prior search is performed to reduce the database size

param.name: param_blind_p_value_blind
param.label: used for generating the minimized database

param.name: param_blind_snd_db
param.label: name of the minimized trie database generated when using blind mode

param.name: param_blind_max_ptm_size
param.label: maximum modification size (in Da) to conside

param.name: param_force
param.label: Overwrite tool specific checks

tool.help:
Annotates MS/MS spectra using Inspect.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_InspectAdapter.html
